name: Rainbow Poncho Cape in Aqua with Pink Heart Hood
description:
It's a modern take on an old fashioned concept--the poncho. It's warm and toasty and gives her plenty of freedom to move her arms, and for Little Miss Independent--she can put it on all by herself! And the beauty of the poncho? You can get at least two seasons out of it! Use it for spring and again for fall--it's hard to outgrow, and that's just how I like to design my clothing. You get your money's worth!

DESCRIPTION: Made from 100% no pill, aqua polar fleece in a round shape with white pom pom trim. Multi-colored rainbow and cloud applique machine stitched on the front. Hood is lined with pink and white heart print cotton fabric.

EASY TO CARE FOR: Machine wash gentle, tumble dry low or hang dry. Non chlorine bleach.

SIZES: 12mos-2T, 3-4T, 5-6.

AVAILABILITY & SHIPPING: Domestic shipping is via priority (2-3) days and all items in-stock items ship the following business day from payment. International shipping is via first class and is non-trackable. Delivery times vary by country and time of year.

Size

★ 12-mos-2T - made to order, requires 14 days
★ 3/4T - made to order, requires 14 days
★ 5/6 - made to order, requires 14 days

name: Grow with Me School Days Red Owl Poncho with Apple Hood - Size 12mos-2T, 3/4T, 5/6
description:
As seen in Child Style Magazine!

It's a modern take on an old fashioned concept--the poncho. It's warm and toasty and gives her plenty of freedom to move her arms, and for Little Miss Independent--she can put it on all by herself! And the beauty of the poncho? You can get at least two seasons out of it! Use it for spring and again for fall--it's hard to outgrow, and that's just how I like to design my clothing. You get your money's worth!

DESCRIPTION: Made from 100% no pill, red polar fleece in a round shape with yellow pom pom trim. Multi-colored owl applique with black button eyes is hand embroidered on the front. Hood is lined with red and pink apple print cotton fabric.

EASY TO CARE FOR: Machine wash gentle, tumble dry low or hang dry. Non chlorine bleach.

SIZES & AVAILABILITY: 12mos-2T, 3-4T, 5-6. Size 3/4 is ready-to-ship!


PLEASE NOTE: POM-POM TRIM IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 OR CHILDREN STILL PUTTING THINGS IN THEIR MOUTHS. SIZE 12mos-2T WILL SHIP WITHOUT POM-POM TRIM.

name: BLACK AND WHITE AND RED ALL OVER ELEPHANT JUMPER
description:
Do you sometimes feel like your constantly buying clothes to keep up with the growth spurts and the seasons? I know I do! That's why I love this little A-line dress.

Makes a cute jumper for her now, and a swing top for her later! Wear it with a long or short sleeve shirt in the fall, winter and spring and without in the summer. Looks great as a dress with leggings or tights, or keep it casual as a top with jeans. No doubt about it, this little number works hard for the money!

This dress is made with modern black and white diamond fabric and features a brick red colored hand embroidered elephant with a black button eye peaking out from the side of the dress. Red buttons on the shoulders. Fully lined.

EASY TO CARE FOR: My dresses are made with pre-shrunk 100% cotton and are machine washable and dryable. We recommend turning them inside out and washing them in warm water and tumble dry low setting. You can iron the dress on a non-steam cotton setting.

ORDER TIME & SHIPPING: All dresses are being made to order. Please allow up to 10 days for completion of custom dresses. Shipping is priority (2-3) days.

Size 12-18 mos and 4T are READY-TO-SHIP!

SIZING INFO: Dress is designed to fall just below the knee or slightly lower. If you would like me to take up the hem, just let me know. Available in sizes 12mos to 5T.

description:
It's a modern take on an old fashioned concept--the poncho. It's warm and toasty and gives her plenty of freedom to move her arms, and for Little Miss Independent--she can put it on all by herself! And the beauty of the poncho? You can get at least two seasons out of it! Use it for spring and again for fall--it's hard to outgrow, and that's just how I like to design my clothing. You get your money's worth!

DESCRIPTION: Made from 100% no pill, purple polar fleece in a round shape with pink pom pom trim. Multi-colored Russian nesting doll applique with black button eyes is hand embroidered on the front. Hood is lined with pink matryoshka print cotton fabric.

EASY TO CARE FOR: Machine wash gentle, tumble dry low or hang dry. Non chlorine bleach.

SIZES: 12mos-2T, 3-4T, 5-6
Sizes 5/6 is ready-to-ship

PLEASE NOTE: POM-POM TRIM IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 OR CHILDREN STILL PUTTING THINGS IN THEIR MOUTHS. SIZE 12mos-2T WILL HAVE ALTERNATE TRIM INSTEAD OF POM-POMS.

name: LONDON CALLING UNION JACK SKIRT
description:
As seen in Cool Mom Picks!

You were rockin the Casbah while other kids were singing along with Elmo. You're just cool like that. And you *know* that this Union Jack skirt is gonna go great with your black Doc Marten boots.

This skirt is made with navy, white and red cotton fabric and machine stitched to look like the real Union Jack. Please note it is made to fray a bit to give it that real authentic flag look. This skirt has a non roll elastic waist for comfort.


EASY CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Iron on linen/cotton setting. Turn inside out prior to washing for best results.

AVAILABILITY & SHIPPING: All items are currently made to order. Please allow 10 days for your skirt to be made. Shipping is priority (2-3) days and all items in-stock items ship the following business day from payment.

SIZING INFO: Available in size 12-18 mos, 2T, 3T, 4T, 5T, 6.
Size 4T and 5T are ready to ship.

As seen in Cool Mom Picks 11/10
